response.overview: Viridescent is a drama-filled science fiction in the tradition of verdant. A visionary woman and a defeatist man, each with their own convictions, must work together to retrieve crucial biological data that has been lost. Leila Montesclaros, a renowned scientist, and Noah Bolfango, the mission captain and software engineer of the genesis in Mars, have scanned and transcripted every frequency in the last five years. Then, with a breakdown of communication between the two, a one-man mission aroseâ€” a one-man mission of a woman.
response.title: Viridescent
